title: Robitussin Cough & Immune Health Honey Elderberry, 8.3 oz

cleaned_text: Cough & Immune Health Honey Elderberry, 8.3 oz8.0fl oz Additional perks How would you like to receive this item ? Wellness in a snap1 Description - One 8.3 oz bottle of natural honey flavored Robitussin Naturals Cough Relief + Immune Health Honey, Ivy Leaf and Zinc Dietary Supplement - Drug and alcohol free dual-action cough relief and immune support dietary supplement - Vegetarian, Non-GMO liquid cough syrup for adults is easy to take - Natural honey flavored cough syrup made with real elderberry and no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives - Contains real ivy leaf and honey to help relieve occasional cough, along with zinc for immune support - Adults may take 1 tablespoon of this elderberry cough syrup every day as needed - This dietary supplement is vegetarian and gluten-free - Robitussin Naturals dietary supplement is free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives Robitussin Naturals Cough Relief + Immune Health is powered by the best of nature to help relieve your cough and support your immune system. Each dose of this drug free, alcohol free, dual action cough syrup is made with purposefully selected ingredients. Real ivy leaf and honey help relieve the occasional cough associated with hoarseness, dry throat and irritants, while zinc offers immune support (1). Free from artificial colors, flavors and preservatives, this Robitussin cough syrup is made with real elderberry and infused with True Source Certified Honey for added flavor. Robitussin Naturals Cough Relief + Immune Health is a vegetarian, Non-GMO liquid that is easy to take (2). Simply take one tablespoon daily as needed to help relieve cough and clear mucus (1). This elderberry cough syrup for adults comes in an easily portable bottle that's made from up to 30% plant based materials. (1) These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. (2) For more information on our non-GMO standard, visit robitussin.com Made in CanadaAdults 1 tablespoon (15 ml) daily as needed. ©GSK group of companies or its licensor [Show More](javascript:void(0)) Product Specifications IngredientsPurified Water, <2% Citric Acid Nutrition FactsServing Size 1 tbspServings Per Container 16 Nutritional Information % Daily Value Sodium 5mg <1% Total Carbohydrate 16g 6% Calories 60 Total Sugars 15g Includes Added Sugars 15g Zinc (as zinc gluconate) 1.8mg English Ivy Leaf (Sambucus nigra) 150mg Honey 18g WarningsShould be 18 or older to purchase. Packaged with tamper-evident bottle cap. Do not use if breakable ring is separated or missing. Do not take both products within 6 hours of each other.
